doc.title: Cake Walking Horses
doc.plot: This is a decided novelty. Did you ever see horses do a Cake-Walk? Well, here they are, trained and managed by Messrs. Frank Melville, Wm. Gorman, and the Misses Mamie Kline and Lillian Shaffer, the Kings and Queens of the Hippodrome. The most perfect presentation of polite equestrianism ever seen in any arena, amateur or professional. The film is a true representation of this marvelous act.
